name: Flight Over Denali National Park
description:
In this video, you’ll see some unbelievable views from our flight over Denali National Park. 

If you watch this video, you’ll join us for a flight over a completely cloudless Denali. You’ll see the glaciers, mountains, and snowcapped peaks, not to mention the tundra, Denali Park Road, and so much more that make this one of the most remarkable flights around.

Kantishna Air Taxi offers visitors to the remote Denali National Park the opportunity to take a so-called “Flightseeing” trip around the area to gain a new perspective on Denali National Park. But we booked a flight with them as a means to avoid the six-and-a-half hour bus ride out. 

We’d planned to fly from Kantishna, at the very back of Denali National Park out to the entrance. It was scheduled to be about 35 minutes, but the weather on our departure day was beyond perfect. And our pilot offered a thrilling ride up to the very edge of Denali’s 20,000+ feet. 

0:00 Introduction
1:26 Hello Jetsetters!
2:34 The Kantishna Airport
4:02 Taking off
5:30 Denali Views Begin
9:20 Landing at the Denali National Park Entrance
